meanings.sent1: The parr swam swiftly in the stream.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of parr in the river.
meanings.sent3: The playful parr splashed around in the water.
meanings.sent4: The parr darted like an arrow through the water.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the parr caught the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To give birth to a young salmon or trout
meanings.sent1: The mother fish will parr soon.
meanings.sent2: The river will be filled with new parr.
meanings.sent3: It's a joyous occasion when fish parr.
meanings.sent4: The river seems to parr life itself.
meanings.sent5: The act of parring brings new life to the waters.
